author: A D Balasubramaniyan
text:
Palanisamy, a secondary grade teacher attached to Panchayat Union Middle School in Koottaiyur village, has been suspended on the charge of misbehaving with girl students in the school.

Demo staged

The residents of the village were angered when the news spread. They converged in front of the school to stage a protest.

As the teacher had not turned out to the school they demanded his presence. The education authorities conducted an enquiry and the District Elementary Education Officer Rajendran suspended Palanisamy.
title: Teacher suspended for misbehaving with girls
